FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING R.A. NO. 9262 OR "AN ACT DEFINING VIOLENCE AGAINST WOMEN AND THEIR CHILDREN, PROVIDING FOR PROTECTIVE MEASURES FOR VICTIMS, PRESCRIBING PENALTIES THEREFORE, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES", EXPANDING ITS COVERAGE AND COVERED ACTS PRESCRIBING PENALTIES THEREFORE, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : NOGRALES, JUAN FIDEL FELIPE F.
DATE FILED : 2019-09-30

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for Meeting/Hearing on 2019-12-09
      2. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2019-12-09
          -Since House Bill No. 4888 purports to expand the coverage of the law from women to all those who suffer violence from their partners, the Committee decided to exclude House Bill No. 4888 from the substituted E-VAWC bills and consider it separately in another meeting.
